description: This file is a React component for a web page that serves as an integrations setup UI. It includes forms for configuring JIRA and Confluence credentials, manages states for these forms, renders UI layout with sidebar, header, and footer, and injects global CSS styles. The component handles form submissions to a backend API and performs some development-time consistency checks for styles.

methods.name: submitJira
methods.description: Async function to submit JIRA credentials to backend API endpoint '/api/integrations/jira'.

methods.name: submitConfluence
methods.description: Async function to submit Confluence credentials to backend API endpoint '/api/integrations/confluence'.

methods.name: GlobalStyle
methods.description: Component to inject raw CSS into a dedicated style tag, with consistency checks between server and client styles.

methods.name: safeJson
methods.description: Utility to parse JSON from fetch response safely, returning empty object if parsing fails.

methods.name: SidebarItem
methods.description: Component for rendering a navigational item in sidebar with active state.

methods.name: FormField
methods.description: Component for rendering labeled input fields with associated value and change handler.
